alert.note: Alert for Delta; Luce; Menominee; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 4:54AM EDT until March 31 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT /10 AM CDT/ FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Luce, Menominee, Delta, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 11 AM EDT /10 AM CDT/ Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact multiple commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Delta; Luce; Menominee; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
